storyInfo:
In a corner of the core city, Mephisto has an encounter with the sarcophagus.
After a fierce battle, Patriot discovers Amiya's secret. He remembers the words of an old prophecy, and finally falls.

attributes.content: Mon3tr, hold!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Screech)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Sniper operators, keep up the fire on his torso. His armor is already severely damaged. Casters, keep the other guerrilla fighters under control. Don’t let them interfere.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Wails)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Pull back, Mon3tr. You don’t have advantage in close quarters! You can’t stop him now!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The sword is slipping! Even if... I try to hold him, I can’t move him. He feels like a landslide...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Focus the energy into a beam... focus... keep focusing... then aim the beam at his heart!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hissss...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Fire! Now!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Grrr...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Even that wasn’t enough to destroy him...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'Ever fight is to the death. Life on the line in every fight, for life will return to the blood, and live forever in another body...'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Vanguard operators, keep up the pressure... fall back. His own body will unleash the 'cannibalism' ritual, as if he himself is a gigantic witchcraft device...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee, there are many Sarkaz who would not see a Wendigo like you sacrificed for nothing.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No. How can I, be sacrificed?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I can still, move. I can still, kill you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My body, still hears, my commands.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I have not yet felt, the pain... misery, and regret.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Is it enough? Could it be? Enough?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Mr. Buldrokkas'tee... please, stop... stop this! Fighting more will only bring you more suffering!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Warrior.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: A warrior, should carry, all of the dead.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I carry, their pain, their hate, their silence.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If I, stop...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: They died for nothing.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Suffering? You should, suffer.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You cannot, defeat me.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Hnng...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don’t be sad, my love...
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: You won’t remarry? Don’t be like that, dear...
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: *Sigh*, but you won’t agree with my yapping. You’re stubborn as a stone. Have I ever convinced you of anything?
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: You’ll keep fighting, won’t  you?
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Promise me, Buldrokkas'tee, promise me you won’t die in battle.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: My only hope is that you don’t suffer any more. Just think, after I’m gone, you’ll still have our family. Look, our little Gro.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: He’s so cute when he’s sleeping.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: With his two little red horns, that still haven’t hardened...
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: This is life. It’s the continuation of my life. A child is the continuation of all the life in our world.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: I know you won’t eat me. I know how much you hate Wendigo traditions.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: But I do so wish to flow through your life forever.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: And yet, life... is ever immortal.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: You’re withering away. All that sadness is going to destroy you. Our son needs you to take care of him. Lingering here will be the death of you.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: ...No, Buldrokkas'tee. You’re not a cold-blooded monster.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Your love for me is true. Even a misanthropic woman like me, managed to return your love all the same.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: You look surprised... Don’t be. I love you, just as tenderly and generously as you loved me.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee, my love... the family you’ll come to have, is also my family.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: That’s how I love you.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Helen, I don’t deserve your love.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I couldn’t protect you. I couldn’t, keep my word.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My family, I couldn’t protect... any of them.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I don’t deserve... love.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You trusted me. I broke my promise.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I broke my promise, but I live. And so the promise, still remains.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Because the promise, bears hate, and regret.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Not only, the dead. Feline, where is it? Your hate? Your regret?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You, carry it, as you go.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The people, of this city. The Ursus Infected. The world. Those who lost, their parents. The world. Those whose parents, did wrong.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: They are all carried.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Father, I’m begging you! Don’t stand with the Empire!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: Orders? The Empire’s orders are ridiculous!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: No, I’m sorry, Father... I wasn’t mocking you. I would never.
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: But the imperial decree is a cruel joke played on all of us.
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: My friend Hector was flogged alive on the bridge, just because they found out he had Oripathy!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: Didn’t you like his poetry too? Didn’t you read them aloud at night and shed tears of joy?
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: He’s dead! He’s been sent down the dark path of death and left us forever, never to return!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: He was a poet. Only the written word had the right to send him to his death!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: The Empire’s so-called infected decree is just a wicked intrusion into our hearts!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: That kind of death, the death of the Infected, is a disgrace to both those who take life and who lose it!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: Did the soldiers of the Empire win the Emperor’s favor with this disgrace? It’s ridiculous!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: You were born in Kazdel, you grew up with Infected Sarkaz... I know you can understand the Ursus Infected too!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: ...Why are you so indifferent? Is your heart made of iron too? Or is it because you, as a still uninfected Sarkaz, have no compassion in your heart?
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: We’re Sarkaz... who’s more susceptible to Oripathy than Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: Maybe when one of us gets infected, you’ll know how absurd these crimes are!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: Maybe then you’ll leave your path of bloodshed and take a walk down the boulevard of mercy!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: Fine, fine, Father...! You’re the one and only Buldrokkas'tee! If Oripathy won’t haunt a tough soldier like you, it’ll just have to creep up on me!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: When it’s hovering over my corpse laughing at you, you’ll finally realize your mistake!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: Don’t let yourself regret it, Father!
attributes.name: Son

attributes.content: ...Grrovae'zeeal, you were innocent. So innocent.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The Infected, was me. I hid it, from you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Father, to the end, had eyes, and was blind. Father couldn’t walk, the right path.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I... regret.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I truly, regret.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My son... Father killed you. Father let you, die for nothing.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Father... doesn’t deserve, to be your father.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If I stop fighting, I betray them.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: More... I see... more and more...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mr. Patriot... You have so much regret... You never said anything? You never confided in anyone?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can only bear, my regrets.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Mon3tr, get back from him!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I would think, why did, the King, as she was, end like that?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You won’t answer. Her Majesty’s death, to this day, is a mystery.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But I know, she never ran. Start to finish, she would only smile.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If I stop fighting, all resistance, means nothing. If I stop fighting, I ran.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I cannot stop.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: We’re not related, though? It’s kind of weird to call you dad.
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: ...You don’t look so good?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: No way! It’s not because... my brothers and sisters are scared of me!
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Hey, do you have any ideas? On how I can get them to stop hiding from me because of you?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: If you do, I’ll even call you daddy!
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Huh? Threat-en? I don’t know what that word means. You didn’t teach me yet.
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: *Sigh*, you told me my brother learned everything really fast. But I can only go step by step... Where’s my brother now?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Huh?! Why are you hugging me all of a sudden? You’ll freeze!
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: ...Are you crying? I felt something drip on my shoulder...
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: No? Everyone says you don’t have blood or tears. Does that mean you don’t cry?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: But you’re definitely crying, Daddy...
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: ...I don’t know what I was saying! I’m sorry! Daddy, are you crying because you’re freezing and it hurts?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Daddy! Daddy! I won’t say things like that anymore! And, and when I grow up... I’ll make a medicine for you so you won’t get frozen!
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Then you won’t cry anymore, right? I’m gonna grow up really fast!
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Family?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Oh, you mean my brothers and sisters, and me, and you, we’re all a family? Even my brother who isn’t here?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Um... then, Daddy, you’re everyone’s daddy!
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Then I’ll learn from you, and avenge grandma! I’ll kill all the bad people who bully us!
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: I can’t say that?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Why?! You kill the bad guys every day, Daddy!
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: ...What do you mean you don’t want me to become like you? Aren’t you a good guy?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: How can my daddy be a bad guy?! That doesn’t make any sense! Tell me! How are you a bad guy?!
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: I hate you, Daddy!
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: If I can’t be like you, can I go to the city?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Um... Daddy... Can we really go to the city?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: The candy fingers you were talking about... are they really good?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: So I can’t eat it if I’m like you...? Oh...!
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: I don’t get it.
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Daddy...?
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: I guess, it doesn’t matter, I could be a good guy or a bad guy.
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: As long as I can be with you, Daddy, and my brothers and sisters... forever.
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: You’re my family, I know. My closest family.
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Obviously, the second is... the third is...
attributes.name: Daughter

attributes.content: Yelena... Yelena... My daughter.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My daughter... Father, couldn’t, do anything, for you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I couldn’t, do anything.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I owe you, too much.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Too much.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Too much, too much...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Cautus girl. You are, Rhodes Island’s leader.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: What is special, about you?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: One of your people, told me of you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Your warriors, are excellent. But only excellent, they still die.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Where is it? Show me, your worth.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You want to stop, the core city. But you can’t, defeat me?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Don’t touch Amiya!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: One, two, three... four!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Shield, shattered.
Spear, snapped.
The huge monster doesn’t even flinch. He keeps hulking forward.
Heh.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You can, pierce my armor. This suit, is finally, at its limit.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...You won’t get away...!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Feline, you are strong. A threat, to me.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Wait, Mr. Patriot.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Only ten, more steps. No need to wait.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You’re at your limit, I know.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Because you’re not a caster like Miss FrostNova...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is enough already.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I’ve seen everything... in these Arts. Everything of you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...It’s enough, Mr. Patriot.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It’s enough.
What... is... this?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: This strike, it’s precise.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I can’t, move, anymore.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...His wounds are finally catching up to him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (I planned, to destroy you, then the guerrillas, in your name, kill Talulah.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: (No need, now. You won, the right, to kill, Talulah.)
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: (Mr... Patriot?)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (How could I, let the Infected, be enslaved, exploited?)
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: (My life, take it. Use it. It’s your prize, as the victors.)
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You, won.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Dame. Please. Take this.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: —What is it?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The key, to stop, Chernobog.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If you go, to the bridge... you need it.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Mr. Patriot, you... just to...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I did, intend, to kill you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But now, you defeated me. You earned it.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.options: Why did you take it this far?

attributes.content: Because I don’t trust you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I only trust, war.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My daughter, was naive. She was soft, she assumed, an outcome.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I don’t. I wait for results.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: And this... is the best... result.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My men, surprised, did not use, their strength. They live.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Only I, alone... will die. A worthy death.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...What happened?!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Closure, I need the schematics to Bioprocessing Unit Thirteen!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Cabin temperature is increasing rapidly! It’s an energy leak!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Wait, it’s changing shape! Why is it progressing like this after fourteen hours?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: PRTS, who was in this cabin last?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}? Did we lose someone in the battle for Lungmen? Who’s being processed?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Wait, slow down. Who did you say Dr. {@nickname} put in there?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Dame!
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I’m listening, Buldrokkas'tee.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Wendigos, exiled ourselves, lost everything.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But we carry, Sarkaz traditions.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Ancestors, molded me, nurtured me, watched over me. Now, bear witness.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...I don’t know if I’m qualified.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I think you, are the best, choice.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: '...I hereby witness a Sarkaz. Buldrokkas'tee, Wendigo of Kazdel, betrayed neither flesh nor blood, disgraced not his tribe.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'He leaves his body, with his life, under the light...'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: '...And his soul returns to the warm blood of the Wendigos.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is a curse.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It is not, to me.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Oh... I feel... I feel... My vision, begins to blur.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Thank you, Dame.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I thought you hated this stuff.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I, am old.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Where are we?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Ha. So that’s how it is. Ha.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Talulah really did betray us.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: You think we’re just going to stand here and let you kill us?!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: You can’t fight.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: If there’s an afterlife, take your revenge there.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: We’re supposed to give up, just because we know we’re going to die?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: We're going to be killed for no reason and—
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Don’t kill them.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Let them go.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Mephisto...?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Devils, I’ll give you bodies that know no pain. Let them go.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: We’re a lot tougher than your herd.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I’ll share my life with you. And you’ll really fight forever, a tireless fight.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: ...Fine.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: But if we let them go, my people have to watch them. We’re not about to disobey Talulah now.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You, crossbowmen. Go.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Mephisto?!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: (Why would he save us...? Is this part of Talulah’s plot?)
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: But why come here?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: ...Because I want to go in there. I want to know what secrets there are. I want to know why Rhodes Island would bring someone out of here.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Because I saw someone coming out of here on the logs.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Mephisto...? Why?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Would you like to hear a song?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: But, Captain Faust said... He said...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Yes, yes. I can’t sing anymore.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Oh, but I can try.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: It ought to be a lullaby, yes? I don’t remember who taught it to me... I’ve forgotten.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: It’s just, someone in my dreams was humming it.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Go to sleep, go to sleep♪
Hedgehog dolls and little bears...
The Ursus, Infected, where will, they go?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: How many stars... does the dark night, hide?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...Captain, Captain!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Final order.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Captain...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Fight on. Live on.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Only you, walk... your own path.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: To have a path, you must walk.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I will die. But I do not know, if I should die, now.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: What is it, my death, can change?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Maybe you, can tell me, the answer.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Sink into the still dark...
Brothers, sisters, young, and old. Dreams, oh dreams, envelop their bodies...♪
Missy? What are you bawling about...?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I’m not bawling!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Fine, fine. But you’re right in front of the door to L.G.D. Headquarters.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Probably don’t want other people seeing you cry, huh?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: N... Nobody’s here anyway!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: How about this? I’ll sit on the steps in front of you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I’m big enough. Nobody’ll see you cry if I’m in the way.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What are you doing...?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh. Well, we screwed up, so we feel lousy, right?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I mean both of us, Missy. We both blew it, didn’t we?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What do I care...? I don’t care where she went!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Um, right. I know.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hey, no hitting. You’re going to hit me no matter what I say, huh?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Finally...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My... life... can end.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Helen... Grrovae'zeeal... Yelena...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: It’s you...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I’m finally... going home...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: No.
—No.
No.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Hallucination.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: How... I, don’t need visions, don’t need, consolation!
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Who...?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Who shows me... hallucinations?!
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Oh... How...? How did Mr. Patriot... break free?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Now, I see.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: —You. Cautus. It’s you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You, are her... successor.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Theresis, lied. The King... had a... successor.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You are... the Lord of Fiends.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: To die, at the hands, of... the King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I... how?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: In the end, I could not, escape fate.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: No. No...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Amiya?! You can’t...?!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: S-Sorry! B-But Dr. Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I heard, in the past, Lords of Sarkaz, gave visions of comfort, as favors.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Their champions, could see great walls, or loves long passed—
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Countless soldiers, for these visions, fought ceaselessly.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I just, I only... Mr. Patriot, I didn’t mean to... I didn’t want...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...The end of your life... it shouldn’t be so tragic!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I saw it... I saw your two hundred years of life...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The constant fighting... and so much loss... you lost everything...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don’t... I don’t want that... to be your end!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: My, end?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...No
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I wanted to give you... a better...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My end, is not, someone else’s, to give!
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: A vision? No! That is not my end!
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If it is tragic, then it is tragic. If foolish, then foolish!
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: This is, my end. The end... I deserve.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I lived. I fought. I failed.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: It’s, enough.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Why? Why...? Why is it enough?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No one should have to lose everything like this!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...You are still, a child.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I’m not a child! I’ve been in more battles than I can count!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...A good ending, is never earned. Only children, believe in, happily ever after.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You, and my daughter, are only children, who believe in, fairy tales.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I told FrostNova, too heavy... too heavy.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I disagreed, with her. She was... a young girl. Only a child.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Oripathy, slavers, our world... won’t even spare, a child.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Talulah, sent her, to die.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Then why not join us and fight Talulah tog—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What can you, give me?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You cannot, even give, what Talulah, once gave me.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Later, what will you, become?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: This is fate. I tasted, too much.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I will never, bow to fate.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Even if, every time, fate brings me, to the same... end...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I would rather, wrestle it, until again, the sun rises.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But... Maybe, you can change.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I fought fate, so many years... in the end, I could not win.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But you... Maybe you’re, different...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Do you have, what it takes, to succeed the King?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you have, the power, to leave, alive?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Do you have, the courage, and insight, to step into, the infinite, wilderness?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I can’t do it alone.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I’m not alone.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Maybe...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Everything... is yours. Only you... can do it.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: That... Reunion, tyrant, fate... You will... overthrow them.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Wait.
No.
Kal'tsit looks up at the darkened sky.
Where have I seen this before?
It couldn’t be...
Amiya... Amiya...?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Sarkaz prophecy is born out of their collective racial memory. Originium energy bursts popping in areas with high concentrations... the core city is suffering a Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The altar... Amiya... Wendigo... The Lord of Fiends?!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wait, if this has a direct affect... Impossible! The last of the ancient Wendigo bloodline is directly connected to the entire Sarkaz race?!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The prophecy... this prophecy?!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Snow? Buldrokkas'tee’s cannibalization resonated with all the altars?! And what I just added... the Wendigos’ ressurection...!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: All operators!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Anything he says... Anything Buldrokkas'tee says...!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do not believe a single word!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Wendigo suddenly speaks, his hoarse voice seemingly echoing throughout the entire central district.
I see cities, devastated.
I see Originium, blanketing the land.
I see you, black crown on your head, melting millions of lives, into nothing but memories.
I see the, King of Sarkaz, enslaving all peoples, everywhere.
Impossible... No...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Patriot! Don’t believe the prophecy! It’s just a physiological side effect of the Originium Arts!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But... But I know... all the prophecies... come true.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: And I died, at the hands of, the King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...Dame. No. Dame.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee! Did you not fight against fate your entire life?!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The young, King of Sarkaz…
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...You, you...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Will be the most horrific disaster to afflict our world.
She must die!
Or else, the world will die!
I cannot, let you live.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You can hate me.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The sound of clanking armor reaches your ears.
The ravaged monster suddenly reaches out to Amiya.
—Amiya!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: W-Watch out!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The Cautus girl does not flinch. The shadow of death sweeps upon her smoke-blackened face. She does not move. She does not scream. She only stares directly into Patriot’s eyes.
As if staring directly into his soul.
At the same time, heavy black blades and shimmering beams of ominous energy pierce swiftly into the giant’s immortal body. Still, he remains unshaken.
Just as Patriot is about to crush the skull of the girl in black...
The Wendigo freezes in place.
Something appears to be dripping sorrowfully from his helmet.
A minute passes.
During this eternity of a minute, there are no other sounds except for the low rumbling of the moving city.
Then, the realization dawns. The monster standing before us is dead.
Having never taken a single step backward, unwavering for even a single second, in the end, death put a stop to the Patriot’s lifelong advance.
